name: Nginx REST API Framework
tagline: Lightweight framework for creating RESTful APIs in PHP.
body:
This is the core for developing Lightweight framework for creating RESTful APIs in PHP. Expandable with MVC supported architecture, you can add as many controllers as you wish.

The NginX rewrites required are also included in txt format.


### Authors and Contributors
Angelos Hadjiphilippou (@angelexevior)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the framework? Check out the documentation or contact angelos@exevior.com and iâ€™ll do my best to help you sort it out.
